topComments.author: Jelle Dijkema
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Eu recomendo ir aqui. A entrada √© gratuita. Mesmo em um s√°bado n√£o parecia lotado. She used geometrical 3-dimensial shapes. The rest of the museum is beautiful as well. If you go upstairs the (I guess permanent) art tells you the history of Mexican independence. It's nice if you understand a bit of Spanish to be able to follow the explanation (or use another tool).
